laboratory_examinations.findings: Mr. A was found to be in full-blown congestive heart failure with a low ejection fraction and four-chamber cardiac dilation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition deteriorated over time leading to heart failure diagnosis.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Assess for signs of rejection post-transplant.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Followed up weekly; no significant complications were reported.
